resources.string: "Have you wondered what your IQ score is? This IQ Test will give you a fast, free and accurate iq score. Take our quick free IQ test and find out just how smart you are...
"The test has five questions. Each question carries different score on the basis of difficulty level. The IQ percentage will be evaluated on your score. All the Best..."
"1.Rearrange the letters of the name SOCRATES to give two other eight letter words. What will be the first letter of both words?"
"2.What number should appear next in this sequence: 2,6,14,30,62,126?"
"3.A pet shop has 8 hamsters, 18 rabbits and 7 guinea pigs. How many dogs does it have?"

"4.I am a large animal. Change one letter and I am a dwelling. Change another letter and I am a very small animal. Remove one letter and I am a river. Finally change one letter and I am an electrical device. What did I finally become?"
"5.The following numbers have something in common, which is the odd one out? 263, 441, 482, 572, 393"
